nodes.text: The Lost Rodian hunters were a Rodian hunting group that had ventured onto the Rryatt Trail — a long and winding trail through the dense Kashyyykian forests. On the Wroshyr Canopy level of the trail, the hunters set up a small camp. But they got lost in the dangerous forests and couldn't find their way out. Eventually, they went mad and attacked anyone near them.
In 1 ABY the Rodian hunter Tressk, who viewed these crazed Rodians as an embarrassment, asked a spacer to kill them.
